verses.verse: וַֽיהוָ֛ה <WH3068> And the LORD פָּקַ֥ד <WH6485> visited אֶת־ <WH853> שָׂרָ֖ה <WH8283> Sarah כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> he אָמָ֑ר <WH559> as he had said וַיַּ֧עַשׂ <WH6213> did יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> and the LORD לְשָׂרָ֖ה <WH8283> unto Sarah כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> he דִּבֵּֽר׃ <WH1696> as he had spoken

וַתַּהַר֩ <WH2029> conceived וַתֵּ֨לֶד <WH3205> and bare שָׂרָ֧ה <WH8283> For Sarah לְאַבְרָהָ֛ם <WH85> Abraham בֵּ֖ן <WH1121> a son לִזְקֻנָ֑יו <WH2208> in his old age לַמּוֹעֵ֕ד <WH4150> at the set time אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> of which דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> had spoken אֹת֖וֹ <WH854> for אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> of which God

וַיִּקְרָ֨א <WH7121> called אַבְרָהָ֜ם <WH85> And Abraham אֶֽת־ <WH853> שֶׁם־ <WH8034> the name בְּנ֧וֹ <WH1121> of his son הַנּֽוֹלַד־ <WH3205> that was born ל֛וֹ אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom יָלְדָה־ <WH3205> bare לּ֥וֹ שָׂרָ֖ה <WH8283> unto him whom Sarah יִצְחָֽק׃ <WH3327> to him Isaac

וַיָּ֤מָל <WH4135> circumcised אַבְרָהָם֙ <WH85> And Abraham אֶת־ <WH853> יִצְחָ֣ק <WH3327> Isaac בְּנ֔וֹ <WH1121> his son בֶּן־ <WH1121> old שְׁמֹנַ֖ת <WH8083> being eight יָמִ֑ים <WH3117> days כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> had commanded אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> as God

וְאַבְרָהָ֖ם <WH85> And Abraham בֶּן־ <WH1121> old מְאַ֣ת <WH3967> was an hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> years בְּהִוָּ֣לֶד <WH3205> was born ל֔וֹ אֵ֖ת <WH853> יִצְחָ֥ק <WH3327> Isaac בְּנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> when his son

וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said שָׂרָ֔ה <WH8283> And Sarah צְחֹ֕ק <WH6712> me to laugh עָ֥שָׂה <WH6213> hath made לִ֖י אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> God כָּל־ <WH3605> everyone הַשֹּׁמֵ֖עַ <WH8085> [so that] all that hear יִֽצְחַק־ <WH6711> will laugh לִֽי׃

וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And she said מִ֤י <WH4310> Who מִלֵּל֙ <WH4448> Who would have said לְאַבְרָהָ֔ם <WH85> unto Abraham הֵינִ֥יקָה <WH3243> suck בָנִ֖ים <WH1121> should have given children שָׂרָ֑ה <WH8283> that Sarah כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יָלַ֥דְתִּי <WH3205> ? for I have born בֵ֖ן <WH1121> [him] a son לִזְקֻנָֽיו׃ <WH2208> in his old age

וַיִּגְדַּ֥ל <WH1431> grew הַיֶּ֖לֶד <WH3206> And the child וַיִּגָּמַ֑ל <WH1580> and was weaned וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <WH6213> made אַבְרָהָם֙ <WH85> and Abraham מִשְׁתֶּ֣ה <WH4960> feast גָד֔וֹל <WH1419> a great בְּי֖וֹם <WH3117> the [same] day הִגָּמֵ֥ל <WH1580> was weaned אֶת־ <WH853> יִצְחָֽק׃ <WH3327> that Isaac

וַתֵּ֨רֶא <WH7200> saw שָׂרָ֜ה <WH8283> And Sarah אֶֽת־ <WH853> בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son הָגָ֧ר <WH1904> of Hagar הַמִּצְרִ֛ית <WH4713> the Egyptian אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom יָלְדָ֥ה <WH3205> which she had born לְאַבְרָהָ֖ם <WH85> unto Abraham מְצַחֵֽק׃ <WH6711> mocking

וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> Wherefore she said לְאַבְרָהָ֔ם <WH85> unto Abraham גָּרֵ֛שׁ <WH1644> Cast out הָאָמָ֥ה <WH519> this bondwoman הַזֹּ֖את <WH2063> likewise וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּנָ֑הּ <WH1121> and her son כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לֹ֤א <WH3808> not יִירַשׁ֙ <WH3423> shall not be heir בֶּן־ <WH1121> for the son הָאָמָ֣ה <WH519> of this bondwoman הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> likewise עִם־ <WH5973> with בְּנִ֖י <WH1121> with my son עִם־ <WH5973> with יִצְחָֽק׃ <WH3327> [even] with Isaac

וַיֵּ֧רַע <WH7489> distressed הַדָּבָ֛ר <WH1697> And the thing מְאֹ֖ד <WH3966> was very בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> sight אַבְרָהָ֑ם <WH85> in Abraham's עַ֖ל <WH5921> and אוֹדֹ֥ת <WH182> because בְּנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> of his son

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said אֱלֹהִ֜ים <WH430> And God אֶל־ <WH413> to אַבְרָהָ֗ם <WH85> unto Abraham אַל־ <WH408> not יֵרַ֤ע <WH7489> be distressed בְּעֵינֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5869> in thy sight עַל־ <WH5921> because הַנַּ֣עַר <WH5288> because of the lad וְעַל־ <WH5921> because אֲמָתֶ֔ךָ <WH519> and because of thy bondwoman כֹּל֩ <WH3605> all manner אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after תֹּאמַ֥ר <WH559> hath said אֵלֶ֛יךָ <WH413> about שָׂרָ֖ה <WH8283> in all that Sarah שְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> unto thee hearken בְּקֹלָ֑הּ <WH6963> unto her voice כִּ֣י <WH3588> for בְיִצְחָ֔ק <WH3327> for in Isaac יִקָּרֵ֥א <WH7121> be called לְךָ֖ זָֽרַע׃ <WH2233> shall thy seed

וְגַ֥ם <WH1571> also אֶת־ <WH853> בֶּן־ <WH1121> And also of the son הָאָמָ֖ה <WH519> of the bondwoman לְג֣וֹי <WH1471> a nation אֲשִׂימֶ֑נּוּ <WH7760> will I make כִּ֥י <WH3588> because זַרְעֲךָ֖ <WH2233> because he [is] thy seed הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

וַיַּשְׁכֵּ֣ם <WH7925> rose up early אַבְרָהָ֣ם ׀ <WH85> And Abraham בַּבֹּ֡קֶר <WH1242> in the morning וַיִּֽקַּֽח־ <WH3947> and took לֶחֶם֩ <WH3899> bread וְחֵ֨מַת <WH2573> and a bottle מַ֜יִם <WH4325> of water וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> and gave אֶל־ <WH413> to הָ֠גָר <WH1904> [it] unto Hagar שָׂ֧ם <WH7760> putting עַל־ <WH5921> on שִׁכְמָ֛הּ <WH7926> [it] on her shoulder וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַיֶּ֖לֶד <WH3206> and the child וַֽיְשַׁלְּחֶ֑הָ <WH7971> and sent her away וַתֵּ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> departed וַתֵּ֔תַע <WH8582> and wandered בְּמִדְבַּ֖ר <WH4057> in the wilderness בְּאֵ֥ר שָֽׁבַע׃ <WH884> of Beersheba

וַיִּכְל֥וּ <WH3615> was spent הַמַּ֖יִם <WH4325> And the water מִן־ <WH4480> in הַחֵ֑מֶת <WH2573> the bottle וַתַּשְׁלֵ֣ךְ <WH7993> and she cast אֶת־ <WH853> הַיֶּ֔לֶד <WH3206> the child תַּ֖חַת <WH8478> under אַחַ֥ד <WH259> under one הַשִּׂיחִֽם׃ <WH7880> of the shrubs

וַתֵּלֶךְ֩ <WH1980> went וַתֵּ֨שֶׁב <WH3427> and sat her down לָ֜הּ מִנֶּ֗גֶד <WH5048> over against הַרְחֵק֙ <WH7368> [him] a good way off כִּמְטַחֲוֵ֣י <WH2909> shot קֶ֔שֶׁת <WH7198> arch כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אָֽמְרָ֔ה <WH559> for she said אַל־ <WH408> not אֶרְאֶ֖ה <WH7200> Let me not see בְּמ֣וֹת <WH4194> the death הַיָּ֑לֶד <WH3206> of the child וַתֵּ֣שֶׁב <WH3427> And she sat מִנֶּ֔גֶד <WH5048> him וַתִּשָּׂ֥א <WH5375> over against [him] and lift up אֶת־ <WH853> קֹלָ֖הּ <WH6963> her voice וַתֵּֽבְךְּ׃ <WH1058> and wept

וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> heard אֱלֹהִים֮ <WH430> And God אֶת־ <WH853> ק֣וֹל <WH6963> the voice הַנַּעַר֒ <WH5288> of the lad וַיִּקְרָא֩ <WH7121> called מַלְאַ֨ךְ <WH4397> and the angel אֱלֹהִ֤ים ׀ <WH430> of God אֶל־ <WH413> to הָגָר֙ <WH1904> to Hagar מִן־ <WH4480> from הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> out of heaven וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> and said לָ֖הּ מַה־ <WH4100> to her What לָּ֣ךְ הָגָ֑ר <WH1904> to Hagar אַל־ <WH408> nay תִּ֣ירְאִ֔י <WH3372> affright כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for שָׁמַ֧ע <WH8085> hath heard אֱלֹהִ֛ים <WH430> not for God אֶל־ <WH413> about ק֥וֹל <WH6963> the voice הַנַּ֖עַר <WH5288> of the lad בַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after הוּא־ <WH1931> he שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> in it

ק֚וּמִי <WH6965> Arise שְׂאִ֣י <WH5375> lift up אֶת־ <WH853> הַנַּ֔עַר <WH5288> the lad וְהַחֲזִ֥יקִי <WH2388> and hold אֶת־ <WH853> יָדֵ֖ךְ <WH3027> him in thine hand בּ֑וֹ כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for לְג֥וֹי <WH1471> nation גָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> him a great אֲשִׂימֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH7760> for I will make

וַיִּפְקַ֤ח <WH6491> opened אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> And God אֶת־ <WH853> עֵינֶ֔יהָ <WH5869> her eyes וַתֵּ֖רֶא <WH7200> and she saw בְּאֵ֣ר <WH875> a well מָ֑יִם <WH4325> of water וַתֵּ֜לֶךְ <WH1980> went וַתְּמַלֵּ֤א <WH4390> and filled אֶת־ <WH853> הַחֵ֙מֶת֙ <WH2573> the bottle מַ֔יִם <WH4325> with water וַתַּ֖שְׁקְ <WH8248> drink אֶת־ <WH853> הַנָּֽעַר׃ <WH5288> the lad

וַיְהִ֧י <WH1961> and became אֱלֹהִ֛ים <WH430> And God אֶת־ <WH854> was with הַנַּ֖עַר <WH5288> was with the lad וַיִּגְדָּ֑ל <WH1431> and he grew וַיֵּ֙שֶׁב֙ <WH3427> and dwelt בַּמִּדְבָּ֔ר <WH4057> in the wilderness וַיְהִ֖י <WH1961> and became רֹבֶ֥ה <WH7235> abundance קַשָּֽׁת׃ <WH7199> archer

וַיֵּ֖שֶׁב <WH3427> And he dwelt בְּמִדְבַּ֣ר <WH4057> in the wilderness פָּארָ֑ן <WH6290> of Paran וַתִּֽקַּֽח־ <WH3947> took ל֥וֹ אִמּ֛וֹ <WH517> and his mother אִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> him a wife מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> out of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt פ

וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> came בָּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> And it came to pass at that time הַהִ֔וא <WH1931> he וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> spake אֲבִימֶ֗לֶךְ <WH40> that Abimelech וּפִיכֹל֙ <WH6369> and Phichol שַׂר־ <WH8269> the chief captain צְבָא֔וֹ <WH6635> of his host אֶל־ <WH413> to אַבְרָהָ֖ם <WH85> unto Abraham לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> God עִמְּךָ֔ <WH5973> in בְּכֹ֥ל <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you עֹשֶֽׂה׃ <WH6213> [is] with thee in all that thou doest

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> now הִשָּׁ֨בְעָה <WH7650> Now therefore swear לִּ֤י בֵֽאלֹהִים֙ <WH430> by God הֵ֔נָּה <WH2008> unto me here אִם־ <WH518> you will not תִּשְׁקֹ֣ר <WH8266> that thou wilt not deal falsely לִ֔י וּלְנִינִ֖י <WH5209> with me nor with my son וּלְנֶכְדִּ֑י <WH5220> nor with my son's son כַּחֶ֜סֶד <WH2617> [but] according to the kindness אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which עָשִׂ֤יתִי <WH6213> that I have done עִמְּךָ֙ <WH5973> you תַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> unto thee thou shalt do עִמָּדִ֔י <WH5978> against וְעִם־ <WH5973> and to הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> unto me and to the land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which גַּ֥רְתָּה <WH1481> wherein thou hast sojourned בָּֽהּ׃
וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> said אַבְרָהָ֔ם <WH85> And Abraham אָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> I אִשָּׁבֵֽעַ׃ <WH7650> I will swear

וְהוֹכִ֥חַ <WH3198> reproved אַבְרָהָ֖ם <WH85> And Abraham אֶת־ <WH853> אֲבִימֶ֑לֶךְ <WH40> Abimelech עַל־ <WH5921> and אֹדוֹת֙ <WH182> because בְּאֵ֣ר <WH875> of a well הַמַּ֔יִם <WH4325> of water אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which גָּזְל֖וּ <WH1497> had violently taken away עַבְדֵ֥י <WH5650> servants אֲבִימֶֽלֶךְ׃ <WH40> which Abimelech's

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said אֲבִימֶ֔לֶךְ <WH40> And Abimelech לֹ֣א <WH3808> neither יָדַ֔עְתִּי <WH3045> I wot מִ֥י <WH4310> who עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> not who hath done אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> this thing הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this וְגַם־ <WH1571> again אַתָּ֞ה <WH859> me לֹא־ <WH3808> me neither הִגַּ֣דְתָּ <WH5046> didst thou tell לִּ֗י וְגַ֧ם <WH1571> again אָנֹכִ֛י <WH595> I לֹ֥א <WH3808> not שָׁמַ֖עְתִּי <WH8085> yet heard בִּלְתִּ֥י <WH1115> I [of it] but הַיּֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> to day

וַיִּקַּ֤ח <WH3947> took אַבְרָהָם֙ <WH85> And Abraham צֹ֣אן <WH6629> sheep וּבָקָ֔ר <WH1241> and oxen וַיִּתֵּ֖ן <WH5414> and gave לַאֲבִימֶ֑לֶךְ <WH40> them unto Abimelech וַיִּכְרְת֥וּ <WH3772> made שְׁנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH8147> and both of them בְּרִֽית׃ <WH1285> a covenant
וַיַּצֵּ֣ב <WH5324> set אַבְרָהָ֗ם <WH85> And Abraham אֶת־ <WH853> שֶׁ֛בַע <WH7651> seven כִּבְשֹׂ֥ת <WH3535> ewe lambs הַצֹּ֖אן <WH6629> of the flock לְבַדְּהֶֽן׃ <WH905> themselves

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said אֲבִימֶ֖לֶךְ <WH40> And Abimelech אֶל־ <WH413> to אַבְרָהָ֑ם <WH85> unto Abraham מָ֣ה <WH4100> What הֵ֗נָּה <WH2007> in שֶׁ֤בַע <WH7651> [mean] these seven כְּבָשֹׂת֙ <WH3535> ewe lambs הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> these אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which הִצַּ֖בְתָּ <WH5324> which thou hast set לְבַדָּֽנָה׃ <WH905> alone
